name: Alice Clancy's Shattered Dimensions
summary: A nine map wad Made from scratch inspired by Megawads such as Eviternity, Ancient Aliens and Taransman's Projectile Hell. It follows Alice Clancy, a rookie marine who guards a new portal created by the UAC that allows them to go to other dimensions, but an accident happens and she gets transported to that dimensions where demons struck a deal with a cult of foul creatures known as the Serpanteens, after the first encounters with them She finds out that they made a deal with them to conduct a secret experiment, that acquires creating a new powerful monster, Alice needs to figure out the secrets of the Research and try to stop this powerful monster before he enters and destroy her Home Dimension.
